Developing your tea-based analysis

General concepts Apps Configs Libs

General concepts

TEA has a very simple structure, with libraries, apps and configs:

\apps
  \examples
  \ttH_analysis
\configs
  \examples
  \ttH_analysis
\libs
  \core
  \extensions
  \histogramming
